description: A home in Water 7 operated as an orphanage by a woman called Aunt (or Auntie). She takes care of multiple orphaned children, including Michael and Hoichael, treating them as her own family despite having no blood relation.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Arrives at the Orphanage
keyEvents.description: Michael and Hoichael bring Zoro to their home at Aunt's orphanage, where he meets their adoptive family.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces the main location for the episode and establishes the family dynamic.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Does Housework
keyEvents.description: Zoro performs various household chores at the orphanage including sorting junk and babysitting children.
keyEvents.significance: The orphanage serves as the setting for the episode's comedic moments.

keyEvents.title: Loan Sharks Attack
keyEvents.description: Loan sharks arrive at the orphanage demanding money and threatening to kidnap the family.
keyEvents.significance: The orphanage becomes the site of the episode's central conflict.

keyEvents.title: Battle at the Orphanage
keyEvents.description: Zoro fights and defeats the loan sharks and Mikazuki at the orphanage to protect the family.
keyEvents.significance: The climactic battle takes place at this location, resolving the episode's conflict.

statusHistory.reason: The orphanage continues operating after the events of the episode

description: A major water city known for its shipbuilding industry, canals, and unique architecture. The Straw Hats are still present in Water 7 during this filler episode following the Enies Lobby arc.

keyEvents.title: Zoro's Sword Shop Search
keyEvents.description: Zoro travels through Water 7 visiting multiple sword shops attempting to repair Yubashiri.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Zoro navigating the city and establishes his quest for the episode.

keyEvents.title: Chased Through the Streets
keyEvents.description: Michael and Hoichael chase Zoro through Water 7's backstreets using their knowledge of the city.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the boys' familiarity with Water 7's layout.

keyEvents.title: Shopping in Water 7
keyEvents.description: Zoro accompanies the orphan family shopping in Water 7 while trying to avoid his crewmates.
keyEvents.significance: Shows daily life in Water 7 and creates comedic moments as Zoro hides from Sanji and others.
